title: DUMB, but I need help!
body:
This may seem like the dumbest question, and feel free to berate me for it, but I seriously cannot figure out how to get an avatar/icon for my profile. I see everyone else with summoner icons etc but I don't have one?   {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

 Please help :~)

replies.body: Bump. Still need help with this. Maybe a red can offer a hand?

When you start the game you should be given the option to pick one
If you don't have one, go onto your league profile and click the Icon to the right of your PLAY button, choose an icon

I mean on the boards... I'm not that stupid.....hahahaha

EDIT: See how mines just a question mark, and yours is different?

That's strange.. The icon is supposed to be the same as whatever summoner icon you picked in league. Basically, if you wanted to change your icon in the Boards, you change it on League.

Must be some kind of bug, or maybe you just didn't pick an icon lool.

I have an icon, maybe it's not supported or something? I haven't seen the particular icon I have on here yet.. I'll try changing it. Thanks.

EDIT: changed icon and relogged, nothing changed.. D: {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
